name: nodus
description: Nodus is a competition and event management tool for sporting events like speedcubing. It is integreated with both [WCA](https://worldcubeassociation.org) and [WCA Live](https://live.worldcubeassociation.org) and offers many features for both organizers and competitors like:

scripts.deploy:server: git add . && git commit -m Deploy && git push heroku master
